tellurium.visualization package¶

Submodules¶

tellurium.visualization.SBMLDiagram module¶

SBMLDiagram extension via graphviz.

class tellurium.visualization.SBMLDiagram.SBMLDiagram(sbml, species={}, reactions={}, reactants={}, products={}, modifiers={})[source]¶

Bases: object

Create a network diagram from a sbml model.

draw(layout='neato')[source]¶

Draw the graph. Optional layout=[‘neato’|’dot’|’twopi’|’circo’|’fdp’|’nop’] will use specified graphviz layout method.

Parameters:layout (str) – pygraphviz layout algorithm (default: ‘neato’)
